msbt.message: Oh, hey! You found the treasure even though the hunt is over? Thanks! I'll take that off your hands.
You were so close today. We have got to play again sometime, !

! You're OK!Everything went dark during our treasure hunt! It happened to you too right?I've been trying to figure out what happened. Was it an eclipse? Aliens? Probs something like that.Whatevs. We'll just have to make sure our next treasure hunt is TWICE as fun, .
